name: Escape Pod (Ritz)
description:
Escape Pod

On your way back home from Senta-5 your ship crashed. You were the only person to get to an escape pod and you are now stranded in deep space. 

Instructions

  • Combine your ship by collecting floating pieces
  • Move around using the arrow keys/WASD
  • Heal by picking up new nodes
  • The weapons shoot by themselves

This was created in ten days during the Bevy Jam #2 by KDecay, geom3trik, ANVF-Postal and Ritz from Meadowlark.

Every asset, including the sound effects and the music were made during the game jam.

  • Music: KDecay
  • Sound effects and startup-sound: ANVF-Postal
  • Pixelart: Ritz
